title: Broken Hill: A Productionized Greedy Coordinate Gradient Attack Tool for Use Against Large Language Models
summary: Walkthrough the GCG attack at a high level and be introduced to Broken Hill – Bishop Fox’s newly-released tool that can perform the GCG attack against a variety of popular LLMs.

title: Google & Arm - Raising The Bar on GPU Security
summary:
Posted by Xuan Xing, Eugene Rodionov, Jon Bottarini, Adam Bacchus - Android Red Team;
	    Amit Chaudhary, Lyndon Fawcett, Joseph Artgole - Arm Product Security Team

Who cares about GPUs?

You, me, and the entire ecosystem! GPUs (graphics processing units) are critical in delivering rich visual experiences on mobile devices.

title: Cybersecurity's dark secrets: 3 confessions from industry experts
summary: From gnawing imposter syndrome to communication challenges with execs, cyber pros at DEF CON anonymously shared their “unfiltered truths” about working in the industry.
